subsection.name: Description
subsection.div: Ensures that when is used instead of a single if statement inside a case block.
subsection.p: Rationale: Java 21 has introduced enhancements for switch statements and expressions that allow the use of patterns in case labels. The when keyword is used to specify condition for a case label, also called as guarded case labels. This syntax is more readable and concise than the single if statement inside the pattern match block.

See the
Java Language Specification for more information about guarded case labels.

See the
Java Language Specification for more information about patterns.
